name: RIWA
membership: RIWA Rhine is member of IAWR
goal: RIWA aims to achieve a good water quality in the rivers Meuse, Rhine and Scheldt by preventing harmful substances from entering the river. The quality has to be such that natural purification steps are sufficient to produce impeccable drinking water from it.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, International co-operation and development, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Water Framework Directive (WFD)
Environmental Quality Standards Directive (EQSD)
EU strategy on Pharmaceuticals in the Environment
REACH
Drinking Water Directive
